name: HIGHSCORE ABSORBER
description:
Get high scores by absorbing highscores!

Climb the online leaderboard in this fun casual game.

[CONTROLS] Mouse (aim and click) Additional info This game is a submission to the ScoreJam#20 Gamejam (https://itch.io/jam/scorejam20). THEME: ABSORB Also it is my GameAWeek#5
